statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, date FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE working_hours > 8;
SELECT employee_id, date, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, date, check_in_time, check_out_time, working_hours FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE date = '2023-10-15';
SELECT employee_id, check_in_time, working_hours FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE check_in_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, date, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE working_hours > 8;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2023-10-01' AND '2023-10-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_id, check_in_time, check_out_time, date FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, month_year, total_working_hours FROM EmployeeWorkingHours WHERE total_working_hours > 160;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(total_working_hours) AS max_hours, MIN(total_working_hours) AS min_hours FROM EmployeeWorkingHours;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT employee_id, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(total_working_hours) AS total_hours_worked FROM EmployeeWorkingHours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING SUM(total_working_hours) > 160;
SELECT employee_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE employee_id = 102 AND MONTH(date) = 6 ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.check_in_time, w.total_working_hours FROM EmployeeAttendance e JOIN EmployeeWorkingHours w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id WHERE e.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY w.total_working_hours DESC, e.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM Employees JOIN Attendance ON Employees.employee_id = Attendance.employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, work_date, hours_worked FROM WorkingHours WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM Employees JOIN Attendance ON Employees.employee_id = Attendance.employee_id WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM Employees JOIN WorkingHours ON Employees.employee_id = WorkingHours.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_id, email FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT attendance_id, check_in, check_out FROM attendance ORDER BY check_in DESC;
SELECT request_id, start_date, end_date, reason, status FROM leave_requests WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE department='HR' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employee WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, (check_out - check_in) AS hours_worked FROM attendance WHERE check_in >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY hours_worked DESC;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, wh.date, wh.hours_worked FROM employee e JOIN working_hours wh ON e.employee_id = wh.employee_id WHERE wh.hours_worked > 8 ORDER BY wh.hours_worked ASC, wh.date DESC;

SELECT lr.request_id, e.first_name || ' ' || e.last_name AS employee_name, lr.start_date, lr.end_date, lr.reason FROM leave_requests lr JOIN employee e ON lr.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE lr.status='approved' ORDER BY lr.start_date ASC;
SELECT id, name, role, department FROM employees;
SELECT name, role FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT department, name FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, name, role FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE role = 'Engineer' AND department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY id;
SELECT name, role FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' OR department = 'Finance';
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees ORDER BY department;
